MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stoneykirk. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm due to a severely damaged electricity pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:59pm on Saturday, 24 October 2020
